patthana15.35:1.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.35:2.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.35:3.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
